i1.name: Granite Shield
description: {{sbc|Innate- Shard of the Monolith:}} '''Malphite''' gains increased percentage [[size]] equal to {{as|8% of his '''total''' armor}}, capped at 35% increased size at {{as|{{fd|{{#expr:35/0.08}}}} armor}}.

{{sbc|Innate:}} '''Malphite''' {{tip|shields}} himself for {{sti|health|{{as|10% of his '''maximum''' health}}}}.
The shield lasts until it is broken, and refreshes if he has not taken damage in the last few seconds.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate- Shard of the Monolith: Malphite gains increased percentage size equal to 8% of his total armor, capped at 35% increased size at Unknown value: #expr:35/0.08 armor.Innate: Malphite shields himself for 10% of his maximum health.
The shield lasts until it is broken, and refreshes if he has not taken damage in the last few seconds.
i1.notes:
* '''Malphite's''' increased size is affected by his base armor and growth, but also reduced by {{ii|Black Cleaver}}. His increased size does not consider {{ais|Thunderclap|Malphite}} '''bonus''' armor.
** The bonus '''will''' become a size reduction if '''Malphite''' is dropped to ''negative'' armor values.
* ''Granite Shield'' does not refresh its cooldown from damage that is mitigated by {{tip|shield|shields}}.

q1.name: Seismic Shard
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Malphite''' sends a rock rolling to the target enemy, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to them upon impact, {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for 3 seconds and gaining {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} equal to the raw amount the target lost.
q1.descriptionHtml: Active: Malphite sends a rock rolling to the target enemy, dealing magic damage to them upon impact, slowing them for 3 seconds and gaining bonus movement speed equal to the raw amount the target lost.
q1.notes:
* The rock spawns 100 units in front of '''Malphite'''.<!-- from his center or edge? -->
* '''Malphite''' will gain the bonus movement speed for the full duration as long as ''Seismic Shard'' impacts the target.
** Both a {{tip|buff}} shown in the hotbar and duration bar above the ability icon will indicate the remaining duration.
* ''Seismic Shard's'' movement speed gain is entirely based off the target's current, and loss of, movement speed.
** Targets that are already {{tip|slow|slowed}} by another effect will grant '''Malphite''' diminished movement speed.
** {{tip|Slow resist|Slow-resistant}} and {{tip|slow-immune}} targets will reduce or nullify '''Malphite's''' gain.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the damage and the slow but not the bonus movement speed gain.

w1.name: Thunderclap
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Malphite''' gains {{sti|armor|{{as|'''bonus''' armor}}}}, tripled while {{ai|Granite Shield|Malphite}} is active.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Malphite's''' next {{tip|basic attack}} within 6 seconds is {{ccs|empowered|physical}} to gain {{sti|50 '''bonus''' attack range}} and deal {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage on-hit}}. It and other basic attacks for the next 5 seconds also trigger a cone [[on-hit]] in the direction of the target, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies hit.
w1.descriptionHtml: Passive: Malphite gains bonus armor, tripled while Granite Shield is active.Active: Malphite's next basic attack within 6 seconds is Unknown value: ccs empowered physical to gain 50 bonus attack range and deal bonus physical damage on-hit. It and other basic attacks for the next 5 seconds also trigger a cone on-hit in the direction of the target, dealing physical damage to all enemies hit.Thunderclap resets Malphite's basic attack timer.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Armor|{{as|{{ap|10 to 30}}% armor}}|Increased Armor|{{as|{{ap|10*3 to 30*3}}% armor}}}}
{{st|Bonus Physical Damage|{{ap|30 to 90}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}} {{as|(+ 15% armor)}}|Cone Damage|{{ap|10 to 50}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}} {{as|(+ 10% armor)}}}}
w1.notes:
* The passive '''will''' amplify [[Armor_penetration#Reducing_armor|''negative'' armor]], too, if '''Malphite's''' armor is dropped that low.
* The empowered attack:
** Prevents '''Malphite''' from casting {{ai|Seismic Shard|Malphite}} and {{ai|Ground Slam|Malphite}} during its windup.
** ''Cannot'' have its {{tip|attack windup|windup}} canceled by new movement or attack commands, or casting {{ai|Unstoppable Force|Malphite}}.
** ''Can'' have its windup canceled by casting {{ii|Hextech Rocketbelt}}.
* The cone starts from '''Malphite's''' location.
** Unlike similar spells, it does not deal its damage separately to the primary target of the attack(s); if the target is outside the [[area of effect]] when struck, it will not take the bonus damage.
* {{Pending for test}}: Interaction with parrying effects ({{tip|dodge}}, {{tip|block}}, {{tip|blind}}).
* Taking into account '''Malphite's''' {{as|'''base''' attack speed}} and attack speed growth, he'll be able to use up to 4-6 (levels 1-18) empowered attacks (including the initial one).
** With {{as|{{fd|2.5}} attack speed}}, he'll be able to use up to 12.

e1.name: Ground Slam
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Malphite''' slams the ground, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all nearby enemies and {{tip|cripple|crippling}} them for 3 seconds.
e1.descriptionHtml: Active: Malphite slams the ground, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies and crippling them for 3 seconds.
e1.notes:
* The {{tip|cripple}} [[Stacking#Stacks multiplicatively|stacks multiplicatively]] with other sources of [[Attack_speed#Decreasing_attack_speed|attack speed reductions]].
* ''Ground Slam'' will cast from wherever '''Malphite''' is at the end of the cast time.

r1.name: Unstoppable Force
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Malphite''' {{tip|dashes}} with {{tip|displacement immunity}} to the target location and, upon impact, deals {{as|magic damage}} to all nearby enemies and {{tip|airborne|knocks them up}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
''Unstoppable Force will cast at max range if cast beyond that.''
r1.descriptionHtml: Active: Malphite dashes with displacement immunity to the target location and, upon impact, deals magic damage to all nearby enemies and knocks them up for 1.5 seconds.Unstoppable Force will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
r1.notes:
* The dash speed can be up-to doubled if ''Unstoppable Force'' is targeted at the middle of a wall so that his destination ends up on the other side.
** It will be decreased if his destination ends up closer to him than his target location.
* If '''Malphite''' dies during his {{tip|dash}}, the ability cancels.
** If the dash is interrupted without '''Malphite''' dying, for instance when he enters {{tip|resurrection}} during ''Unstoppable Force'', he halts and the ability instead affects enemies at the stopped location.
